content.text: I'm a party planner and cook who likes to spend time with my son. What about you?
I'm a fan of Halloween and horse racing.
Oh cool! I love Halloween too. Do you have a favorite costume?
Not really, I just like the creative aspect of it.
I agree! It's fun to come up with something different every year.
I'm glad you think so! I've been taking some welding classes recently, and I've met a lot of new people there.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to weld.
It's a lot of fun! I've made a few things, but I'm still learning.
I'm sure you'll get better with time. What's your favorite thing about it?
I like being able to create something with my own hands. It's a lot of fun to see something come together.
I totally agree! I love being able to see my creativity come to life.
I'm glad you understand! What's your favorite thing about being a party planner?
I love getting to be creative and come up with new ideas. It's also really fun to see people happy and enjoying themselves.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you like it.
Me too! I think it's a great career
